Articles.Content: I just got the game on my Xbox one and I play and I was building a rocket ship. When I placed a pod down a green circle appeared and I couldn’t do anything. I couldn’t even go back into the build menu. I even restarted the game to see and it did nothing. Someone please help me.

I had a glitch similar to this. Look at the bottom left of the screen. Is there a box saying, "New text?"

I had to delete my entire save file after it. The last time I had was a couple months ago, I had hoped they patched it.

On 5/26/2021 at 6:14 PM, Chickenwing78910 said:

This happens often on the KSP Console Editions. I used to play KSP on the PS4 and after this would happen I would have to delete that save and start a new one. The game also crashes a lot on the PS4 even just leaving the pause screen for 10 minutes, Its really annoying. I have ran into 3024 bugs on the PS4 that crashed the game. It can be as simple of pausing the game, placing a part, flying a ship, crashing in to a planet, or just driving a rover. It really annoying.
